document.discussion_title: Cairn Energy PLC (CNE) Given “Add” Rating at Numis Securities Ltd
document.topic_text: Tweet Numis Securities Ltd restated their add rating on shares of Cairn Energy PLC (LON:CNE) in a research note issued to investors on Tuesday. The firm currently has a GBX 210 ($2.70) price target on the oil and gas development company’s stock. Shares of Cairn Energy PLC ( LON:CNE ) opened at 201.80 on Tuesday. Cairn Energy PLC has a 12-month low of GBX 124.70 and a 12-month high of GBX 232.00. The firm’s 50-day moving average is GBX 195.04 and its 200-day moving average is GBX 192.46. The firm’s market capitalization is GBX 1.16 billion. Other equities analysts have also recently issued research reports about the stock. Deutsche Bank AG restated a buy rating and set a GBX 220 ($2.83) target price on shares of Cairn Energy PLC in a research report on Thursday, May 19th. Mirabaud Securities restated a buy rating and set a GBX 240 ($3.09) target price on shares of Cairn Energy PLC in a research report on Tuesday, August 2nd. Barclays PLC lifted their target price on shares of Cairn Energy PLC from GBX 240 ($3.09) to GBX 260 ($3.35) and gave the stock an equal weight rating in a research report on Wednesday, July 13th. Canaccord Genuity restated a hold rating and set a GBX 215 ($2.77) target price on shares of Cairn Energy PLC in a research report on Monday, April 25th. Finally, Liberum Capital lifted their target price on shares of Cairn Energy PLC from GBX 175 ($2.25) to GBX 209 ($2.69) and gave the stock a hold rating in a research report on Wednesday, June 29th. Fifteen equities research analysts have rated the stock with a hold rating and six have issued a buy rating to the company’s stock. The stock has a consensus rating of Hold and a consensus price target of GBX 210.26 ($2.71). Cairn Energy PLC (Cairn) is a United Kingdom-based independent oil and gas exploration and development company. The Company’s portfolio is focused in three geographical regions: North West Europe, the Atlantic Margin and the Mediterranean. Cairn has exploration and appraisal assets in the Atlantic Margin, North West Europe and the Mediterranean, and core development assets in the North Sea. Cairn Energy PLC Cairn Energy PLC
